Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.games

Class Game

java.lang.Object
java.util.Observable
it.polimi.ingsw.model.games.Game
All Implemented Interfaces:
LightGame
Direct Known Subclasses:
SinglePlayerGame
public class Game
extends java.util.Observable
implements LightGame
Game is main class which handle all different phases of a match.

      Parameters:
      card1 - is the LeaderCard chosen to be added to one player.
      card2 - is the LeaderCard chosen to be added to one player.
      player - is the player which has chosen his leader cards.

      Returns:
      if all players have made all their leader cards and resources choices.

    • nextPlayer

      public void nextPlayer()
      shift current player to his subsequent or return to first player.

    • takeMarketMarble

      public Marble[] takeMarketMarble​(boolean isRow, int choice)
      Parameters:
      isRow - is true if current player has selected a market row, is false if current player has selected a market column.
      choice - is current player's choice of market row or column. this method return marbles selected by players and ask the order to play them. at the end if there are any discarded marbles, increase faith points of other players by the amount of them and calls fatihTrackMovementExceptCurrentPlayer() method.

    • increaseWarehouse

      public boolean increaseWarehouse​(Resource resource)
      Specified by:
      increaseWarehouse in interface LightGame
      Parameters:
      resource - stands for the type of resource to increase by 1 in Warehouse.
      Returns:
      false if @param resource has to be discarded.

    • firstIncreaseWarehouse

      public void firstIncreaseWarehouse​(Resource resource, int player)
      Parameters:
      resource - is a chosen resource.
      player - is one player who have to chose one resource before starting game.

    • firstDoubleIncreaseWarehouse

      public void firstDoubleIncreaseWarehouse​(Resource resource1, Resource resource2)
      Parameters:
      resource1 - is a chosen resource.
      resource2 - is a chosen resource. this method increase the warehouse of 4th player by the two chosen resources before starting game.

    • increaseOneFaithPointOtherPlayers

      public void increaseOneFaithPointOtherPlayers()
      this method increase all players except current faith points by 1.
      Specified by:
      increaseOneFaithPointOtherPlayers in interface LightGame

    • faithTrackMovement

      public void faithTrackMovement()
      method that sets the current player's victory points related to the position in FaithTrack and controls if the player is in or beyond the pope space. if it's true it increases the victory points of all the players in the vatican section.
      Specified by:
      faithTrackMovement in interface LightGame

    • faithTrackNotify

      public void faithTrackNotify​(int i, int notifyPlayer)
      Parameters:
      i - is one player.
      notifyPlayer - is the player who activated vatican report. send to each player which player has activated vatican report and how many victory points they have earned.

    • increaseOneFaithPointCurrentPlayer

      public void increaseOneFaithPointCurrentPlayer()
      this method increase current player faith points by 1.
      Specified by:
      increaseOneFaithPointCurrentPlayer in interface LightGame

    • isActiveWhiteConversionCard

      public boolean isActiveWhiteConversionCard​(int chosenLeaderCard)
      Specified by:
      isActiveWhiteConversionCard in interface LightGame
      Parameters:
      chosenLeaderCard - is one player's LeaderCard.
      Returns:
      true if the chosen LeaderCard is an active WhiteConversionCard.

    • getCurrentPlayerLeaderCard

      public LeaderCard getCurrentPlayerLeaderCard​(int chosenLeaderCard) throws AlreadyDiscardLeaderCardException
      Specified by:
      getCurrentPlayerLeaderCard in interface LightGame
      Parameters:
      chosenLeaderCard - is one player's LeaderCard.
      Returns:
      current player chosen LeaderCard.
      Throws:
      AlreadyDiscardLeaderCardException - if chosen LeaderCard was previously discarded.

    • getCurrentPlayerActiveLeaderCards

      public LeaderCard[] getCurrentPlayerActiveLeaderCards() throws AlreadyDiscardLeaderCardException
      Returns:
      the two actives LeaderCards of current player.
      Throws:
      AlreadyDiscardLeaderCardException - if one or both chosen LeaderCards were previously discarded.

    • whiteMarbleConversion

      public void whiteMarbleConversion​(LeaderCard leaderCard)
      Specified by:
      whiteMarbleConversion in interface LightGame
      Parameters:
      leaderCard - is the chosen WhiteConversionCard to convert white marble. this method try to increase current player warehouse by 1 LeaderCard resource. if it isn't possible increase other players faith points by 1.

    • faithTrackMovementAllPlayers

      public void faithTrackMovementAllPlayers()
      method that sets the victory points related to the position in the Faith Track of all the players and controls if the players are in or beyond the pope space. if it's true it increases the victory points of all the players in the vatican section.

    • switchDepots

      public void switchDepots​(int depot1, int depot2) throws ImpossibleSwitchDepotException
      Parameters:
      depot1 - stands for position of the first Depot in current player Warehouse to switch.
      depot2 - stands for position of the second Depot in current player Warehouse to switch.
      Throws:
      ImpossibleSwitchDepotException - if the switch is not possible.

    • findAvailableSlots

      public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> findAvailableSlots​(int deckRow, int deckColumn) throws EmptyDevelopmentCardDeckException
      Parameters:
      deckRow - is the row of the chosen deck.
      deckColumn - is the column of the chosen deck.
      Returns:
      an ArrayList Integer of slots where @card can be inserted.
      Throws:
      EmptyDevelopmentCardDeckException - if player has chosen an empty deck.

    • buyDevelopmentCardFromMarket

      public void buyDevelopmentCardFromMarket​(int deckRow, int deckColumn, int choice, int slot) throws InsufficientResourceException, ImpossibleDevelopmentCardAdditionException, EmptyDevelopmentCardDeckException
      Parameters:
      deckRow - is the row of the chosen deck.
      deckColumn - is the column of the chosen deck.
      choice - is player's choice about which between warehouse and strongbox has the priority to be decreased.
      slot - is player's choice about in which slot want to insert the chosen card.
      Throws:
      InsufficientResourceException - if player has not enough resources.
      ImpossibleDevelopmentCardAdditionException - if is not possible to add the card in player's slots.
      EmptyDevelopmentCardDeckException - if player has chosen an empty deck. this method firstly verifies if buying is possible and then remove DevelopmentCard from the deck where it was contained.

    • removeDevelopmentCardProductionResource

      public void removeDevelopmentCardProductionResource​(int chosenSlot, Strongbox s, int choice) throws InsufficientResourceException, NoSuchProductionPowerException
      Parameters:
      chosenSlot - is the chosen SlotDevelopmentCards to activate last card production power.
      s - is a strongbox.
      choice - is player's choice about which between warehouse and strongbox has the priority to be decreased.
      Throws:
      InsufficientResourceException - if player has not enough resources to activate all production powers together.
      NoSuchProductionPowerException - if player has chosen an empty SlotDevelopmentCards. this method remove player resources by the amount required by the chosen card and increase @param s by the amount given by card production power.

    • basicProductionPower

      public void basicProductionPower​(Resource r1, Resource r2, Resource r3, Strongbox s, int choice) throws InsufficientResourceException
      Parameters:
      r1 - is a resource to be decreased by current player resources.
      r2 - is a resource to be decreased by current player resources.
      r3 - is a resource to be increased by current player resources.
      s - is a strongbox.
      choice - is player's choice about which between warehouse and strongbox has the priority to be decreased.
      Throws:
      InsufficientResourceException - if player has not enough resources to activate all production powers together. this method remove player resources by 1 @param r1 and 1 @param r2 and increase @param s by 1 @param r3.

    • removeAdditionalProductionPowerCardResource

      public void removeAdditionalProductionPowerCardResource​(int chosenAdditionalPowerCard, Resource r, Strongbox s, int choice) throws InsufficientResourceException, NoSuchProductionPowerException
      Parameters:
      chosenAdditionalPowerCard - is the chosen AdditionalProductionPowerCard to be activated.
      r - is a resource to be increased by current player resources.
      s - is a strongbox.
      choice - is player's choice about which between warehouse and strongbox has the priority to be decreased.
      Throws:
      InsufficientResourceException - if player has not enough resources to activate all production powers together.
      NoSuchProductionPowerException - if player has chosen a not active or not existing AdditionalProductionPower. this method remove player resources by the 1 resource required by the chosen card and increase @param s by the 1 resource given by card production power.

    • increaseCurrentPlayerStrongbox

      public void increaseCurrentPlayerStrongbox​(Strongbox s)
      Parameters:
      s - is a strongbox. this method increase current player strongbox by the amount contained in @param s.

    • activateLeaderCard

      public void activateLeaderCard​(int chosenLeaderCard) throws InsufficientResourceException, AlreadyDiscardLeaderCardException, ActiveLeaderCardException, InsufficientCardsException
      Parameters:
      chosenLeaderCard - is current player's choice about which leader card to activate.
      Throws:
      InsufficientResourceException - if current player has not enough resources.
      InsufficientCardsException - if current player has not enough cards.
      AlreadyDiscardLeaderCardException - if current player already discard this LeaderCard previously.
      ActiveLeaderCardException - if chosen LeaderCard is already active.

    • discardLeaderCard

      public void discardLeaderCard​(int chosenLeaderCard) throws ActiveLeaderCardException, AlreadyDiscardLeaderCardException
      Parameters:
      chosenLeaderCard - is current player's choice about which leader card to discard.
      Throws:
      AlreadyDiscardLeaderCardException - if current player already discard this LeaderCard previously.
      ActiveLeaderCardException - if chosen LeaderCard is already active.

    • getColorDeck

      public Deck getColorDeck​(Color color)
      Parameters:
      color - is the color of DevelopmentCards contained in deck.
      Returns:
      the first not empty deck which contains DevelopmentCards of @param color, or the last deck of same kind of cards.

    • zeroRemainingColorCards

      public boolean zeroRemainingColorCards()
      Returns:
      true if there are 0 remaining DevelopmentCards of one kind of color. In this case, SinglePlayerGame finishes.

    • getDeck

      public Deck getDeck​(int row, int column)
      Parameters:
      row - is the row of chosen deck
      column - is the column of the chosen deck
      Returns:
      the chosen deck

    • getPlayer

      public PlayerBoard getPlayer​(int position)
      Parameters:
      position - the position in the arraylist.
      Returns:
      PlayerBoard in @param position.

    • getCurrentPlayer

      public PlayerBoard getCurrentPlayer()
      Returns:
      PlayerBoard in current position.

    • isEndGame

      public boolean isEndGame()
      Returns:
      true if the game is ended. It could be ended if one player has 7 DevelopmentCards or has reached the end of the FaithTrack

    • endGame

      public int endGame()
      Returns:
      the position of the winner of the game. this method find the player with more victory points. in case more players have both max victory points, find which one has more amount of resources.

    • endGameNotify

      public void endGameNotify​(int winner, int maxVictoryPoints, int maxNumOfResources)
      Parameters:
      winner - is the winner of the game.
      maxVictoryPoints - are winner's victory points.
      maxNumOfResources - are winner's amount of resources.

    • endGameNotify

      public void endGameNotify​(int winner)
      Parameters:
      winner - is the winner of the game

    • getCurrentPosition

      public int getCurrentPosition()
      Returns:
      currentPlayer'position

    • getNumOfPlayers

      public int getNumOfPlayers()
      Returns:
      number of players

    • discardNotify

      public void discardNotify​(Deck colorDeck)
      Parameters:
      colorDeck - is one deck of development cards. this method notifies player that Ludovico has discarded one DevelopmentCard. It sends the new DevelopmentCard of the deck or -1 if deck is now empty.
